channel.title: COGS 137: Practical Data Science in R on COGS 137
channel.description: Recent content in COGS 137: Practical Data Science in R on COGS 137

item.description: Note: Exam and final project due dates will not change; however, since this is the first time this course is being taught, the timeline of specific topics and smaller assignments may be updated throughout the quarter. You will always be notified of this explicitly. Week Date Lesson Reading Lecture Slides Lab Slides Lab HW Exam Project EC 00 Fri, Sep 24 Welcome 01 Mon, Sep 27 Tooling Wed Sep 29 R Basics Fri Oct 1 Data Structures 02 Mon Oct 4 dplyr Wed Oct 6 Functions Fri Oct 8 Data Import & Wrangling I 03 Mon Oct 11 Data Import & Wrangling II Wed Oct 13 EDA & Data Visualization Fri Oct 15 Effective Communication 04 Mon Oct 18 Ethics & Making Rigorous Conclusions Wed Oct 20 Modelling Fri Oct 22 Linear Models (Review) 05 Mon Oct 25 CS1: Youth Connection Wed Oct 27 CS1: Youth Connection Fri Oct 29 CS1: Youth Conection 06 Mon Nov 1 Multiple Linear Regression Wed Nov 3 Estimation via Bootstrapping Fri Nov 5 Hypothesis Testing w/ Simulation 07 Mon Nov 8 CS2: Right to Carry Wed Nov 10 CS2: Right to Carry Fri Nov 12 CS2: Right to Carry 08 Mon Nov 15 Effective Visualization Wed Nov 17 Logistic Regression I Fri Nov 19 Logistic Regression II 09 Mon Nov 22 CS3: Vaping Behaviors Wed Nov 24 CS3: Vaping Behaviors Fri Nov 26 No Class - Thanksgiving 10 Mon Nov 29 R Rcosystem: Interactive Viz Wed Dec 1 R Rcosystem: Packages Fri Dec 3 R Rcosystem: Shiny Finals Date of Final Project Due

item.title: Policies
item.description: DRAFT: This will be updated and finalized by week 1 of the Fall 2021 quarter. Class: Class will include short lectures as well as interactive activities. The goal of lecture is to introduce the topics and information needed for the course. The goal of your time outside of lecture is to practice with topics that are introduced and deepen your understanding of material presented in class. Since so much of programming and statistical analysis is learned best by doing, we'll prioritize that throughout the course, both in and outside of the classroom.
